description: Minimally processed meat and poultry products and Fish products.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement**
------------------------

**Tender Title**
---------------

EC095-240005B - Supply of Meat, Fish, and Poultry Products

**Reference Number**
-----------------

WS4560320381-Doc4560320441

**Publication Date**
-----------------

April 29, 2024

**Closing Date**
--------------

May 14, 2024, 2:00 p.m.

**Description**
------------

This tender call is for a standing offer for the supply of minimally processed meat, fish, and poultry products to various government departments.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

* Supply of minimally processed meat, poultry products (UNSPSC: 50111500, 50121500)
* Delivery to multiple regions in Atlantic Canada (New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Labrador)

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

The lowest price will be used as the sole selection criterion.

**Notice Type**
---------------

Request for Standing Offer (Competitive - Open Bidding)

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender call is open to contractors who are eligible to participate under the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other trade agreements.

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC / PSPC)

**Contact Information**
-------------------

Tara Sheppard (elle-la-lui / she-her-hers)
tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**
---------------

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19549032?extsite=MTk1NDkwMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note that all government departments and agencies eligible to participate in this procurement opportunity may contact Tara Sheppard for further information. 

This tender announcement is posted in both English and French. 



=====================================

**Eligible Contractors**
------------------------

Any Canadian business, including sole proprietorships, partnerships, and corporations, is eligible to participate in this procurement opportunity.

**Limitations**
--------------

None.

**Evaluation Criteria**
---------------------

The evaluation will be based on the price of the submitted bid. The lowest price will be used as the sole selection criterion.

**Schedule**
------------

The tender closing date is May 14, 2024. The expected contract start date will be determined
